name: Super Sewer Gators vs Space Bugs
name_original: Super Sewer Gators vs Space Bugs
description:
Sewer Gator Controls: left/right arrow keys to move. up arrow to jump. down arrow to drop through a platform.

Space Bugs Controls: left/right arrows to move. up arrow to shoot.

Made in 48 hours for the GMTK Jam 2021. 

I had so much fun with doing to GMTK Jam last year, so I'm back again this year with, "Super Sewer Gators vs Space Bugs". Two arcade cabinets have been linked together and now you must play both at the same time! 

Design, programming, and art by Thomas Keys.

Song by Jessemyers: https://www.gamedevmarket.net/asset/8-bit-classic-rock-pack/

SFX by SubspaceAudio

Special thanks to Tustin Neilson, Jackson Keys, Mason Burges, and Chandler Penrose for playtesting and feedback.
